just choose exactly the right option for you thank you for purchasing my pattern please email me for pattern support questions or general info each doodle theme is available in 3 formats so you can get the one that works for you www pacificknitco com digital pattern pdf full details and tutorials charts only pdf perfect to add to anything pacificknitco doodle card decks portable and collectable cards @pacificknitco be sure to tag me @pacificknitco in your posts support@pacificknitco com you may also enjoy pattern usage and rights this pattern and all charts located within are the exclusive copywrite of pacific knit co and are intended for personal use only charts may not be used and/or resold in personal designs or patterns finished items made from this pattern may be sold in limited quantities with credit for the pattern provided to pacific knit co thank you for tagging me and my pattern when sharing on social media pattern credits design & photos jamie lomax pacific knit co yarn support yarnaceous fibers & fangirl fibers potato doodle baking doodle pacific knit co © 2025
